title: What can Ayurveda do?
author: Anna Kunle
description: Fundierte Ayurveda-Beratung zu den Themen Konstitutionsbestimmung, Gesundheit, Ernährung, Schönheit und Wohnen - gratis!
sitename: Ayurveda Beratung zu Konstitutionsbestimmung, Gesundheit, Ernährung, Schönheit und Wohnen
text:
With the following health ailments Ayurveda can create relief or even complete healing:
-
Respiratory diseases such as bronchial asthma, chronic bronchitis and sinusitis
-
Musculoskeletal disorders such as back pain, inflammatory joint disease (rheumatoid arthritis), rheumatism and osteoarthritis
-
Gynecological diseases such as endometriosis, fibroids, menstrual cramps, infertility and menopausal symptoms
-
Skin disorders such as acne, psoriasis, atopic dermatitis, inflammation, dry eczema and cellulite
-
Diseases of the cardiovascular system such as high blood pressure, circulatory disorders such as arteriosclerosis, coronary heart disease with angina or the
intermittent claudication
-
Diseases of the nervous system such as multiple sclerosis or vegetative headache / migraine, sleep disorders and nervousness
-
Mental disorders such as anxiety, panic attacks, burnout syndrome and depression
-
Thyroid disorders such as hyperthyroidism
-
Metabolic diseases such as obesity, diabetes I and II, lipid metabolism disorders
-
Diseases of the digestive system such as colitis including ulcerative colitis and Crohn's disease, constipation, gastritis, gastric ulcer and irritable
bowel
